attributes.additional_details: Theres been numerous stories and rumours and no correspondence from anyone regarding the future of the pre school. No letter just emails giving no reason as to why with only 3 days notice to parents of the closure.
attributes.background: Due to recent events this week at Barika pre school in Malpas regarding the closure its time to take a stand and fight for our pre school and for our childrens future and education.

rejection.details: The Barika pre-school is privately owned.
